text:
I will be hacking nights + weekends for the next 38 days.

I am so happy to participate to s5 @_nightsweekends

My Initial idea is to build a journaling app that makes you fall in love with journaling. What do you thinkðŸ‘€?

Why am I building this?

There are a ton of journaling apps, but no one provides guidance. Journaling is hard: it's easy to keep writing the same things, get discouraged, forget to review the past months.

My goal is to fix this. I want to build a journal that focuses on personal growth and problem-solving.

Today I'm launching the waitlist -> https://t.co/ZPEgb5TOuU

This week, I have:
- refined the idea
- built a mailing list
- built a landing page

Everything will be built in public, all in 6 weeks. Follow me if you want to see what I end up building.

cc: @_buildspace, @_nightsweekends, #buildinginpublic

user_info.name: Jacopo Parvizi
user_info.description:
ML Engineering Leader @ RaysearchLabs, Ex H&M RecSys.  
Sharing my journey and lessons learned as I build https://t.co/zpT1SCqswA
